name: Link 'em Froggy!
description:
Round up your enemies and link them together into a train of pain!

Killer Krow - Fires single shots.

Reviver Rat - Heals adjacent units, scares easily!

Tommygun Turtle - Has a lotta health, fires multiple shots.

Didn't get anywhere near finishing this, but at least it's something playable.
